description:
By Florian Klein

More details: http://2016.websummercamp.com/PHP/Using-Behat-and-PHPSpec-for-emergent-design-with-ubiquitous-language

Using simple tools to design apps that respect the ubiquitous language all while improving isolation, decoupling, and testability. Hands on with some real life scenarios that we’ll implement all together.
title: [WEBSC2016] D02L01 Track 1 - Using Behat and PHPSpec for emergent design with ubiquitous language
